description.p: You aspire to greatness like many of the legendary hunters before you. You joined the guild not to find a cozy job within the guild hall's safe walls, but to seek adventure, protect others, or perhaps discover an unknown species.

ul.li: Skill Proficiencies: Survival; Choose one from Animal Handling, Athletics, Stealth
Tool Proficiencies: Choose one from: Glassblower's Tools, Herbalism Kit, Smith's Tools, Tinker's Tools, Woodcarver's Tools

Equipment: A miner's pick, bug net, herbalist kit, or fishing tackle; A guild card, a hunting trap, a momento from your past that represents why you became a hunter, a set of traveler's clothes, a pouch containing 10 gp

b.big: As a member of the Hunter's Guild you are granted additional features:

setters.set: Survival, Animal Handling/Athletics/Stealth, Glassblower's Tools/Herbalism Kit/Smith's Tools/Tinker's Tools/Woodcarver's Tools, 1 language

select.name: Personality Trait
select.item: I constantly scan my surroundings and stay alert.
I am always rooting around in the brush to see what's growing.
I obsess over what tools best bring down my quarry.
I am always the hunter, never the hunted.
I value the wildlife and natural world and believe the balance must be maintained.
I have deep respect for a specific type of animal.
I have learned that the most successful hunt is the one that involves skilled allies.
I value the wildlife and natural world only insofar as it is valuable to me dealing with the merchant guilds.

select.name: Ideals
select.item: Guild. My guild is all that really matters. (Any)
Wealth. I will do whatever it takes to become as rish as the hunters of old. (Evil)
Order. There is a natural order that must be preserved. (Lawful)
Fun. I love my job! Despite the dangerous working conditions, there's nothing I'd Rather do. (Chaotic)
Nature. The natural world is more important than the edifices of the of the city and civilization. (Neutral)
Life. Preserving life and nature is always a worthwile endeavour. (Good)

select.name: Bonds
select.item: My fellow hunters are my family.
I would lay down my life for the Hunter's Guild and the Platinum Court.
I am determined that one day I will lead my guild.
My weapon is made from the first monster I ever hunted.
I will do anything to prove myself greater than my siblings or ancestors.
I'll never forget the training school where I learned my skills, or the other attendants who learned alongside me.

select.name: Flaws
select.item: I act bravely when I'm in a group, but I'm a coward when I'm alone.
I nag people about the impact they have on nature.
I understand animals better than people. I am not very good at socializing and get nervous in crowds.
When bragging about my kills, I tend to lie or exaggerate.
My pride leads me to beleive I'm able to bring down beasts beyond my measure.
What I earn I tend to spend quickly, leaving me groping for the next job at the cusp of becoming a beggar.
